Javascript development

Promises

  • http://pouchdb.com/2015/05/18/we-have-a-problem-with-promises.html

General advices

  • Understand the problem.
  • Keep It Stupid Simple (KISS)
  • Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
  • Begin at the beginning.
  • Start with tests.
  • Do One Thing (DOT).
  • Start small and iterate.
  • Pure function > Function > Factory > Class

Useful libs

  • https://github.com/hapijs/joi : object schema validation
  • http://momentjs.com/ : Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates
  • http://d3js.org/ : manipulating documents based on data
  • https://lodash.com/ : utility library
  • http://paperjs.org/ : Vector Graphics Scripting
  • http://threejs.org/ : WebGL 3D Library
